name: STIR CRY
description:
It’s not possible to escape the pan. Once you in it, you are toast.

But ones skilled with shoot and cover, they live… a little bit longer.

Let’s get the sauce flowing.

🔥 TIME TO DINE! 🔥

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse / WSAD
  • Left button shoots, right button rolls.
  • R - reload (auto)
  • M - mute
